org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers

类 BoltWrapper<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.operators.AbstractStreamOperator<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.BoltWrapper<IN,OUT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, KeyContext, OneInputStreamOperator<IN,OUT>, StreamOperator<OUT>
    直接已知子类:
    MergedInputsBoltWrapper

    public class BoltWrapper<IN,OUT>
extends AbstractStreamOperator<OUT>
implements OneInputStreamOperator<IN,OUT>
    A BoltWrapper wraps an IRichBolt in order to execute the Storm bolt within a Flink Streaming program. It takes the Flink input tuples of type IN and transforms them into StormTuples that the bolt can process. Furthermore, it takes the bolt's output tuples and transforms them into Flink tuples of type OUT (see AbstractStormCollector for supported types).

    Works for single input streams only! See MergedInputsBoltWrapper for multi-input stream Bolts.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BoltWrapper

        public BoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new BoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. As no input schema is defined, attribute-by-name access in only possible for POJO input types. The output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the number of declared output attributes is not with range [0;25].

      • BoltWrapper

        public BoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt,
                   org.apache.storm.tuple.Fields inputSchema)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new BoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. The given input schema enable attribute-by-name access for input types Tuple0 to Tuple25. The output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        inputSchema - The schema (ie, ordered field names) of the input stream. @throws IllegalArgumentException
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the number of declared output attributes is not with range [0;25].

      • BoltWrapper

        public BoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt,
                   java.lang.String[] rawOutputs)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new BoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. As no input schema is defined, attribute-by-name access in only possible for POJO input types. The output type can be any type if parameter rawOutput is true and the bolt's number of declared output tuples is 1. If rawOutput is false the output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rawOuput is true and the number of declared output attributes is not 1 or if rawOuput is false and the number of declared output attributes is not within range [1;25].

      • BoltWrapper

        public BoltWrapper(org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt bolt,
                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> rawOutputs)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new BoltWrapper that wraps the given Storm bolt such that it can be used within a Flink streaming program. As no input schema is defined, attribute-by-name access in only possible for POJO input types. The output type can be any type if parameter rawOutput is true and the bolt's number of declared output tuples is 1. If rawOutput is false the output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:

        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rawOuput is true and the number of declared output attributes is not 1 or if rawOuput is false and the number of declared output attributes is not with range [1;25].

The output type can be any type if parameter rawOutput is true and the bolt's number of declared output tuples is 1. If rawOutput is false the output type will be one of Tuple0 to Tuple25 depending on the bolt's declared number of attributes.
        参数:
        bolt - The Storm bolt to be used.
        name - The name of the bolt.
        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type.
        抛出:

      • open

        public void open()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: AbstractStreamOperator
        This method is called immediately before any elements are processed, it should contain the operator's initialization logic, e.g. state initialization.

        The default implementation does nothing.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 StreamOperator<OUT>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 AbstractStreamOperator<OUT>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - An exception in this method causes the operator to fail.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: AbstractStreamOperator
        This method is called at the very end of the operator's life, both in the case of a successful completion of the operation, and in the case of a failure and canceling.

        This method is expected to make a thorough effort to release all resources that the operator has acquired.

        指定者:
        dispose 在接口中 StreamOperator<OUT>
        覆盖:
        dispose 在类中 AbstractStreamOperator<OUT>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • processElement

        public void processElement(StreamRecord<IN> element)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: OneInputStreamOperator
        Processes one element that arrived at this operator. This method is guaranteed to not be called concurrently with other methods of the operator.
        指定者:
        processElement 在接口中 OneInputStreamOperator<IN,OUT>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
